kpi_info.title: Restart in ACU if value 1
kpi_info.use: This field indicates that duplex restart occurred in ACU(s) during the measurement. The counters are unreliable. The field has effect on all report parts. This counter has value '1' in XML report only in case of missing data and it is not sent at all if no restart occurred in ACU(s) during the measurement. The text appears in ASCII report only in case of missing data.
